title: Declarative
body: Specify validation rules as schemas using objects. No more ifs and pushes.

title: Portable
body: Why write the same thing twice? Reuse validation schemas across your front-end and back-end.

title: Composable
body: Reuse basic schemas with the spread operator and add on to them. No magic, pure ES6.

title: Extensible
body: Embed your own validators and create smart error messages. No need to repeat yourself.
